en: box used to blacken or smoke out something

ngiemboon: Záʼa tàʼ ndʉŋ, á na ńtí gie à ge gwɔ́ tètùʼu.
en: Cut the bamboo so that it is short.

ngiemboon: Gʉa tɛɛ! Tè cʉ́ʼ mèŋ n cúa gú!
en: Leave! Don't let me hit you!
Don't put a lot of water in the pot.
k. small mortar used to reduce something to powder
jump of a frog or toad

ngiemboon: Ntàsoŋ kӱɛ̌ lê tǒŋ, ńcʉ́me ntse.
en: The frog only jumped to throw itself into the water.
